document_data.caption: A map of eastern Sembia showing the Belduuk Road.
document_data.name: Belduuk Road
document_data.mainbody: '''Belduuk Road''' was a roadway found in [[Sembia]] that connected [[Saerloon]] in the south with [[Saerb]] in the north.
document_data.Description: Originating in Saerloon on the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]], the Belduuk Road stretched northwest, intersecting [[Mulhessen]] and the [[Way of the Manticore]]. The road proceeded north through bogs, passing through [[Olturret]], before terminating at the town of Saerb.{{Cite web/Realmslore/Melvos Hammerstars, Part Two}} This northern stretch was colloquially known as "the '''Rattlebones Ride'''" because it was horribly bumpy as a result of countless logs buried in the ground to allow for travelers to cross the bogs.
document_data.Notable Locations:
* [[Saerloon]]
* [[Mulhessen]]
* [[Thelnwalk]], a dirt lane about halfway between Mulhessen and Saerb that led east to the abode of [[Melvos Hammerstars]].
* [[Olturret]]
* [[Saerb]]
